attributes.action: PATIENT CHOICE -Homeopathy, acupuncture, reflexology , aromatherapy and other tried and tested natural therapies be fundrd by NHS.
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to ensure that NHS patients are given the freedom of choice to access 'drug-free' medicine, including homeopathy, acupuncture, reflexology,chiropractic treatment and other safe and effective natural medical therapies  We also ask that the government ensure that local NHS commissioning bodies are not able to overturn the patients choice of medical therapy.
